prodNameC: 「貝爾斯」梵尼蘭杏仁酸試劑(未滅菌)
ingredientsDesc:
1. Reagent 1×25 mL Sodium phosphate buffer 0.6 mol/L pH7.0. 
2. Reagent 1×120 mL Sodium acetate buffer 0.2 mol/L pH6.1. 
3. Reagent 1×170 mL Sodium chloride 2 mol/L.
4. Microcolumns 1×20 Contain a pre-weighted amount of a buffered anionic exchange resin. 
    A. Reagent 1×30 mL Potassium carbonate 3 mol/L.
    B. Reagent 1 for 10 mL Sodium m-periodate powder 0.12 mol/L, after reconstitution.
    C. Reagent 1 for 10 mL Sodium metabisulfite powder 0.67 mol/L, after reconstitution. 
    S. Standard 1 for 5 mL The dosified VMA (0.1 mg) is not perceptible.
applicantAddr: 新北市板橋區民生路三段299巷13號4樓
efficacy: VTM Test的測量結果反映出身體中腎上腺素和正腎上腺素的所有產物。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: A.1795 梵尼蘭杏仁酸試驗系統
